channel.title: How do i give money by a command?!? [508-525]

item.title: How do i give money by a command?!? [508-525]
item.dc:creator: @roflscape roflscape
item.description:
@roflscape wrote:

100 errors… and its wrong anyhow this is my givemod command and if you can see its different codes if (cmd[0].equals("givemod") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("final")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Moderator"); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i give money by a command?!? [508-525]
item.dc:creator: @evildevilric evildevilric
item.description:
@evildevilric wrote:

this is the code:

} if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("givecash")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player other = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; Engine.playerItems.addItem(other, 995, 100000000); return;

btw this command is giving 100m for voting just do ::givecash (name)
